name: Pompom (botbox)
description:
Help Pompom on his way!

In this adventure Pompom will face

challenges she has never faced before.

But these difficulties that go

prepare her for an amazing future.

Collect the 3 flowers and 1 gift box to advance to the next level.

The 6 levels will test your nerves. Be quick and accurate. 

Keyboard arrows moves left, right and climb ladders. Press 'Z' to throw a ball on enemies. It works plug and play with some joypads.

Code, design, tests, music and SFX by Murilo Soares. All Rights Reserved.

Cover art/design by @ldigitalartstudio

Joypad art/design by Murilo Soares

PIX: mínimo R$5,00. chave: a1d992da-d0dc-41e0-93ea-954cd0ac4909
